ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Gordon
ygData.msgSnippet: hah, funniest duel I have ever been in was in the Arena zone.  Me and an enchanter were dueling using a cleric as a pet.  The chanter would charm the cleric I
ygData.messageBody:
hah, funniest duel I have ever been in was in the Arena zone. Me and an
enchanter were dueling using a cleric as a pet. The chanter would charm the
cleric I would use Syvelian's Anti-Magic Aria to cancel his charm then
re-charm the cleric. The chanter would cancel magic and recharm. LOL. At
one point we BOTH had an active charm on the cleric! BTW Clerics make very
poor pets ;)

Rokenn

PS that same day I went took out an enchanter, necro, and a cleric in duels
:)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 10:57 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Gordon
>
>
> I see a duel on the horizon. ;^)
>
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
>
>
>
